document.full_text: cubans, speaking out in citizen meetings leading to a communist party congress in april, have given officials an earful about their economic worries and said the government must do a better job, people close to the process said this week.
document.title: cubans vent frustrations as party congress nears
lines_and_colors: cubans, speaking out in citizen meetings leading to a communist party congress in april, have given officials an earful about their economic worries and said the government must do a better job, people close to the process said this week.
